Sardhatrisatikalottaragama
Based on the edition by N.R. Bhatt:
Sardhatrisatikalottaragama, avec le commentaire de Bhatta Ramakantha.
Pondicherry : Institut Francais d'Indologie 1979.
(Publications de l'Institut Francais d'Indologie, 61)

A small handful of suggested corrections to the edition has been incorporated

projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ jñātvā karma kuryādyathepsitam //
brahmāṇi hrasvāḥ proktāni dīrghā hyaṅgāni ṣaṇmukha //
karanyāsaṃ purā kṛtvā mudrābandhaṃ tu kārayet //
śiro 'psu tejasi śikhāṃ kavacaṃ vāyunā saha //
na tasya jāyate mṛtyur iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ //
yathā deve tathā dehe cintayettu vicakṣaṇaḥ //
mantraiḥ sarvaiḥ sakṛdvatsa upasthānaṃ tu kārayet //
vidhisnānaṃ tataḥ kuryān mūrdhna ārabhya mantravit //
hṛdayaṃ bahurūpeṇa guhyaṃ vai guhyakena tu //
hṛdayaṃ karṇikā padmaṃ dharmaṃ jñānādimeva ca //
uktānuktaṃ ca yatkiñcit tatsarvaṃ hṛdayena tu //
āgneyyāṃ hṛdayaṃ nyasya aiśānyāṃ tu śirastathā //
vidyāṃ tejo vijānīyād vāyuḥ śāntiḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
śivo vidyāṃ tu śikhayā śāntiṃ vai kavacena tu //
ekaikasya śataṃ homyam ityevaṃ pañca homayet //
daśa sapta ca ye śodhyāḥ pṛṣṭāścātra tvayā guha //
jananaṃ cādhikāraṃ ca bhogaṃ caiva layaṃ tathā //
uddhāre prokṣaṇe caiva tāḍane ca tathaiva ca //
saṃdhānaṃ caiva tattvānāṃ kartavyaṃ tu yathākramam //
kasminsthāne tu vicchedyāḥ sadya utkramaṇaṃ katham //
dvādaśānte tu te cchedyāḥ śareṇāstreṇa saṃyutāḥ //
manasi grathitāḥ pāśāḥ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva //
śṛṇu ṣaṇmukha tattvena yena mokṣo dhruvaṃ bhavet //
divyena yogamārgeṇa śaktiṃ yaḥ prerayettu tām //
iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumnā ca tṛtīyakā //
prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca //
prāṇastu prathamo vāyur navānāmapi sa prabhuḥ //

lg.l: samaṃ nayati gātreṣu samāno nāma mārutaḥ //
dhanaṃjayaḥ sthito ghoṣe mṛtasyāpi na muñcati //
nityaṃ nityālpajanmā vyasanayati paśuṃ yauvane bālabhāve ākrānto vāyurekaḥ sa jananamaraṇaiḥ krīḍati bhrāntasattvaiḥ //
sa jīvo jīvalokasya budhyante naiva mohitāḥ //

lg.l: uparicarī khalu śaktistāsāṃ prāgbhāvinī śivasya tataḥ /
ayane savyāsavye dvau puṭakau yugmato viṣuvadāhuḥ /
dhyānādyo viṣuvati ca prāgdalasaṃstho nṛpāvalepī syāt /
tejasvī ca bubhukṣā pīḍā vā jāyate 'gnidikpatre //
yāmye yāmyo bhāvo nairṛtye nairṛto vinirdiṣṭaḥ /
ṛṇaṃ ca kāso vijñeyo niśvāso dhanamucyate //
iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva amā caiva tṛtīyakā //
vibhāgā daśa prāṇasya yo vettyevaṃ sa vedavit //
dehātītaṃ tu taṃ vidyād ādityagrahaṇaṃ budhaḥ //
bhittvā kapāladvāraṃ tu jīvo hyūrdhvaṃ tu recitaḥ //
sa jīvo jīvalokasya mayā proktaḥ samāsataḥ //
yathā tu sakalo devo niṣkalena samanvitaḥ //
vidyā nāma kalā sā tu varṇe varṇe vyavasthitā //
rekheyaṃ vyomni nirvāṇā sā kalā śāntirucyate //
śāntirvidyā pratiṣṭhā ca nivṛttiśceti tāḥ kalāḥ //
na jahāti paraṃ sthānaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvamavyayam //
dakṣiṇasthaṃ hi yadbījaṃ jñānaśaktiḥ parā hi sā //
vāmago 'tha paro binduḥ kriyāśaktiḥ parā hi sā //
eṣa devo 'pi sargastho visṛṣṭo yaḥ sa śambhunā //
mātṛkāyāṃ śataṃ hutvā ekaikasya pṛthak pṛthak //
prāsādaṃ ye na budhyanti te na budhyanti śaṅkaram //
plutena tu sadā vaśyaṃ kurute nātra saṃśayaḥ //
ādāvante ca hrasvasya phaṭkāro māraṇe smṛtaḥ //
avijñāya tvidaṃ samyaṅ naiva siddhyate sarvadā //
arghyaṃ dattvā tu mantrasya japaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ //
uktānuktāni karmāṇi siddhiṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ //
vaśamāyānti te kṣipram iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ //
te janā vaśamāyānti ātmanā ca dhanena ca //
kathaṃ vā jñāyate jñānaṃ kathaṃ vā jñeyamucyate //
īśaṃ vijñāya medhāvī sadā yo nandati svayam //
śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca pañcakam //

lg.note: Note that this definition of the puryaṣṭaka is not
accepted by Ram without considerable distortion.

lg.l: mano binduṃ śive tyaktvā ebhirmuktaḥ śivaṃ vrajet //
kathaṃ bhidyeta deveśa tattvataḥ kathaya prabho //
kṣapaṇaṃ ca tathāntasthaṃ kaṇṭhoṣṭhyaṃ cāṣṭamaṃ viduḥ //

div.note: This verse is NisMula 6:6 (f.21verso, line 2) [reading smṛtam for viduḥ]

lg.l: śūnyaṃ taṃ tu vijānīyād dhṛdayena tu bhāvayet //

lg.l: yo vettyevamimāṃ vyāptiṃ sarvavyāpī na saṃśayaḥ //
ataḥ parataraṃ nāsti vyāpakaṃ vyāpakasya tu //
evaṃ jñātvā tu vidhivat khyātiḥ sarvatra jāyate //
bhūya eva pravakṣyāmi laghutvaṃ jāyate yathā //
hyau madhye hlīṃ namaścānte vāruṇena tu buddhimat //

lg.l: ete cānye ca bahavo munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ //
iṣṭena tu prasādena sarva iṣṭā na saṃśayaḥ //
ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu yatparaṃ tattvam asādṛśyaguṇaiḥ sthitam //
tatkāla eva mukto 'sau yadā jñātaṃ hi tatpadam //
vṛkṣaṃ tu sakalaṃ vidyāc chāyā tasya tu niṣkalā //
brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca īśvaraḥ śiva eva vā //
brahmaṇo hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ kaṇṭhe viṣṇuḥ samāśritaḥ //
nāsāgre tu śivaṃ vidyāt tasyānte tu paraṃ padam //
gamāgamaḥ kathaṃ tasya kena vā nīyate tu saḥ //
śaktyā tu nīyate jīvas tasminprāpya nivartate //
dātāsya narakaṃ yāti siddhyecca na kadācana //
evaṃ jñātvā tu medhāvī vicarettu yathāsukham //
yatra yatra sthito jñānī paramākṣaravit sadā //
